physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Stamped on back of photograph: ''Albert O. Corwin - Commercial Photographer, 1474 Birch St., FR. 7-8865, Denver, Colorado.'' Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#406, B'nai B'rith 171.''

mods.abstract: Several boys dressed in Boy Scout uniforms stand on a stage at the B'nai B'rith building in Denver, Colorado saluting the American flag held by one of the boys. Another boy is holding an unidentified flag. Unidentified men stand on the stage and in front of it saluting the American flag.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
